akn:subsection.akn:heading: Limitation on amount paid to Social Security System of Republic of Panama

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Limitation on amount paid to Social Security System of Republic of Panama The amount paid to the Social Security System of the Republic of Panama with respect to any individual under subsection (a) of this section shall not exceed the individual’s entire lump-sum credit (as so defined).
